metadata.title: CVE-2021-3506 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An out-of-bounds (OOB) memory access flaw was found in fs/f2fs/node.c inthe f2fs module in the Linux kernel in versions before 5.12.0-rc4. A boundscheck failure allows a local attacker to gain access to out-of-boundsmemory leading to a system crash or a leak of internal kernel information.The highest threat from this vulnerability is to system availability.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
